import React, {useContext, useState} from 'react' import {loginApi} from "../../api/auth"; import {UserContext} from "../../context/UserContext"; export const Login = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const {setUser} = useContext(UserContext); const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() const res = loginApi(email, password) if(res){ setUser(res.user) }else{ //error } } return (

Log in to your account

setEmail(e.target.value)} id="email" name="email" type="email" autoComplete="email" required className="block w-full rounded-md border-0 py-1.5 text-gray-900 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset ring-gray-300 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-sky-400 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" />
Forgot password?
setPassword(e.target.value)} id="password" name="password" type="password" autoComplete="current-password" required className="block w-full rounded-md border-0 py-1.5 text-gray-900 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset ring-gray-300 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset focus:ring-indigo-600 sm:text-sm sm:leading-6" />

Not a member?{' '} Sign up now

) }
